document_data.name: Currant
document_data.mainbody: '''Currants''' were a type of berry in the Realms.
document_data.Habitats:
Places in the Realms where currants were known to grow included:
* [[Calimshan]] and
* [[Chessenta]]
* The [[Dalelands]]{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20190914002019/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_010203-09.htm| title = So Saith Ed Jan â€“ Mar 2009| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.Usages:
* In the 14{{Th}} century [[DR]], ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold dried currants for a single [[silver piece]] per {{SI|1|oz|long=yes}}.
* Currants were often featured in the mixture of wild berries known as [[brackleberry jam]].
* Dried currants were commonly used in [[fruitcake]]s.
* Currants were used alongside [[orange]]s to flavor the Calimshan [[ale]] known as [[Golden Sands Brews|Golden Sands Orange]].
* Currants were one of the many types of edible berries in the Realms that could be used as [[material component]]s for the [[spell]] ''[[goodberry]]''.
